GapFillDragDrop.Title: used to/get used to/would
GapFillDragDrop.Instruction: Click on the correct word or phrase and drag it to the correct gap.

Content.Question:
1 Is your secretary getting used to that new computer software?
2 As a child I would often spend hours painting and drawing.
3 Clive didn't get used to wearing a uniform for several weeks.
4 Did you use to play for the school football team?
5 Mariela didn't use to be so self-centred.
6 When I was at university I would never go to bed until well after midnight.
7 It took me ages to get used to using that new DVD recorder.
8 Our teachers used to give us loads of homework.
9 Mr Granger is very used to being in charge of a large department.
10 How long does it take to get used to being on that diet?
